span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使困惑： to make so confused or opaque as to be difficult to perceive or understand
【例】 obfuscate the reader 让读者困惑
【近】 becloud, befog, blur, cloud, fog, muddy
【反】 demystify, elucidate, illuminate, clarify, explain clearly 澄清，阐明
【派】 obfuscated 模糊的
【反】 lucid 清晰的
【记】 ob "over" + fuscare "to make dark,"
【另】 confuse使混淆，defuse 去掉雷管，diffuse 散开, 弥漫，effuse
涌出流出，fuse 熔化成液体，熔合，雷管，引信，infuse 流入，interfuse 混合，obfuscate 使困惑，暗淡，perfuse 灌注，profuse 充满，丰富，refuse 废物，拒绝，suffuse 充满，transfuse 注入，灌输
